title: Follicular Delivery of Nanocarriers to Improve Skin Disease Treatment
details: BR RANE, AJ AMKAR, SS PAWAR, PS GADEKAR… - Novel Nanocarriers for Skin …, 2025
abstract: Skin-related diseases surround a vast array of situations ranging in severity from benign to life threatening. Skin diseases were believed to have insignificant impact on patient's quality of life. The fourth most common source of non-lethal disease was …
